features.name: User Authentication
features.description: Email/password authentication with session management, sign up, sign in, sign out, and profile management

features.name: Document Dashboard
features.description: Grid layout displaying all user documents with create, delete, and preview functionality

features.name: Rich Text Editor
features.description: Full-featured editor powered by TipTap with formatting (bold, italic, underline, strikethrough), headings (H1-H3), lists, blockquotes, auto-save, and export functionality

features.name: Document Management
features.description: Create, read, update, delete documents with auto-save, title editing, and save status indicators

features.name: Knowledge Base
features.description: Add, view, and delete knowledge items (references, notes, research papers) that provide context to AI

features.name: AI Writing Assistant
features.description: Context-aware AI chat that uses document content, knowledge base, chat history, and AI instructions to provide writing assistance

features.name: AI Instructions Management
features.description: Global and document-specific AI instructions to customize AI behavior and writing style

features.name: Document Export
features.description: Export documents to DOCX and PDF formats with formatting preservation

features.name: Subscription Management
features.description: Subscription status checking, trial flow, and Polar checkout integration

features.name: User Profile
features.description: Profile management with name, email, and global AI instructions editing

features.name: Landing Page
features.description: Marketing landing page with hero section, features showcase, and call-to-action

features.name: Account Dropdown
features.description: User account dropdown with profile and logout options

features.name: Routing and Navigation
features.description: React Router setup with protected routes, public routes, and navigation between pages

features.name: Database Schema
features.description: Convex schema definitions for users, documents, knowledge, and sessions tables
